mapper.sql: ID, STEAMIF, STEAMSF, STEAMTEMP, STEAMPR, STEAMSH, STEAMIH, DENS
mapper.insert: insert into STEAM_REAL_TIME (ID, STEAMIF, STEAMSF, STEAMTEMP, STEAMPR, STEAMSH, STEAMIH, DENS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{steamif,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{steamsf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{steamtemp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{steampr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{steamsh,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{steamih,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dens,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update STEAM_REAL_TIME set STEAMIF = #{steamif,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STEAMSF = #{steamsf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STEAMTEMP = #{steamtemp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STEAMPR = #{steampr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STEAMSH = #{steamsh,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STEAMIH = #{steamih,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DENS = #{dens,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
